Title: GoFigure
Description:
Unified .NET configuration, providing the flexibility to quickly swap configuration sources from local file-based settings to anywhere you desire (e.g. remote SQL Server storage, WCF XML service, RESTful JSON service, custom, etc.).

Does your javascript need configuration settings? Web applications are getting more complicated, so GoFigure also provides a jQuery extension using JSON and AJAX to retrieve configuration settings from a REST-based service on the server.
